column1: Home of Rt Hon David Lloyd George
Large gardens Exact location unknown NGR matches elevation
1927 Jan Feb May Marked as estimated
1944 Sept Lloyd George and his wife left for Wales. He died in 1945 without returning
1944 Not printed Low due to lack of supervision
1945 No regular record available Expect 1946 return
1946 Observer away from home too often to take regular readings Station terminated
